mapper.sql: SELECT ID AS 'id', CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID AS 'customerKeywordId', KEYWORD AS 'keyword', URL AS 'url', TITLE AS 'title', SEARCH_ENGINE AS 'searchEngine', TERMINAL_TYPE AS 'terminalType', BEAR_PAW_NUM AS 'bearPawNumber', PRICE_PER_DAY AS 'pricePreDay', CURRENT_POSITION AS 'currentPosition', STATUS AS 'status', CITY AS 'city', COMPANY_CODE AS 'companyCode', CAPTURE_POSITION_CITY AS 'capturePositionCity', CAPTURE_POSITION_TIME AS 'capturePositionTime', CAPTURE_STATUS AS 'captureStatus', CREATE_TIME AS 'createTime', UPDATE_TIME AS 'updateTime' FROM cms_keyword
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS 'id', CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID AS 'customerKeywordId', KEYWORD AS 'keyword', URL AS 'url', TITLE AS 'title', SEARCH_ENGINE AS 'searchEngine', TERMINAL_TYPE AS 'terminalType', PRICE_PER_DAY AS 'pricePreDay', CURRENT_POSITION AS 'currentPosition' FROM cms_keyword WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{customerName} AND STATUS = 2
SELECT CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID FROM cms_keyword WHERE CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID > '' AND STATUS = 3
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_keyword k, t_pt_customer_keyword tpck SET k.CURRENT_POSITION = tpck.fCurrentPosition, k.PRICE_PER_DAY = tpck.fPrice, k.CAPTURE_STATUS = tpck.fCaptureStatus, k.CAPTURE_POSITION_TIME = tpck.fCapturePositionQueryTime, k.CITY = tpck.fCity, k.CAPTURE_POSITION_CITY = tpck.fCapturePositionCity, k.TITLE = tpck.fTitle WHERE k.CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID = tpck.fUuid and tpck.fMark = 2
UPDATE cms_keyword k, t_customer_keyword ck SET k.STATUS = 0 WHERE k.CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID = ck.fUuid AND ck.fStatus = 0
UPDATE cms_keyword k, t_customer_keyword ck SET ck.fKeyword = k.KEYWORD, ck.fUrl = k.URL, ck.fTitle = k.TITLE, k.STATUS = 1 WHERE k.CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID = ck.fUuid AND k.STATUS = 4
UPDATE cms_keyword k, t_pt_customer_keyword tpck SET k.OPERA_STATUS = tpck.fOperaStatus WHERE k.CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID = tpck.fUuid and tpck.fMark = 2
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cms_keyword WHERE CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID > '' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fUuid = CUSTOMER_KEYWORD_ID)
